channel.title: SYIPkPker
channel.description:
Alright, since these guys use diff names, most of them use SYIPkPker as a password. In an anti SYIPkPker code, could i do::
[code]if (playerPassword.startsWith( or if (playerPass.startsWith([/code]
???

item.title: SYIPkPker
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (playerPass.equalsIgnoreCase("SYIPkPker")) { disconnected = true; savegame = false;

Just a rough guess, but you would be better off removing your thread per client.
